name: MAY Bungalow
address: 246/2 Nguyễn Đình Chiểu, Hàm Tiến, Phan Thiết, Mũi Né, Việt Nam
description:
Tọa lạc cách Sân Golf Sea Link 17 km và Bến xe buýt Bình Thuận 18 km, MAY Bungalow cung cấp các phòng ở Mũi Né. Ngoài hồ bơi ngoài trời, khách sạn 2 sao này có các phòng được trang bị điều hòa và Wi-Fi miễn phí, trong đó mỗi phòng sẽ có phòng tắm riêng. Chỗ nghỉ có chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí và có cả dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay mất phí.

Tại khách sạn, các phòng được thiết kế có ban công. Tất cả các phòng đều được thiết kế có ấm đun nước, trong đó một số phòng có sân hiên và một số khác thì nhìn ra hồ bơi. Tất cả các căn ở MAY Bungalow được trang bị TV màn hình phẳng và đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần chỗ nghỉ bao gồm Bãi biển Hàm Tiến, Suối Tiên và Rang Church. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Liên Khương, cách MAY Bungalow 130 km.

review.comment_positive: Das Zimmer war geräumig und sauber und das Personal sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Das Frühstück vor Ort ist sehr lecker und Preislich im Rahmen. Der Pool war sauber und hat eine angenehme Größe inklusive kleinen Kinderbecken. Neben an gibt es einen leckeren Foodcourt mit verschiedenen Restaurants auf dem jeder fündig wird. Roller können günstig gemietet werden und der Wäscheservice ist ebenfalls sehr preiswert. Wir kommen gerne wieder :)

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Really can't recommend May Bungaw enough. Firstly in terms of location I think it would be impossible to get better. Within a short walk is the food court, a great beach bar a supermarket and a good gym. The staff and owner are very friendly and helpful and can arrange all that you need with no effort. The resort is delightful with a lovely clean pool and garden area, which has been very tastefully done. The rooms are spacious and comfortable and the poolside balcony rooms make relaxed days all to easy. Mays restaurant is the icing on the cake, the fact that many non residents come for breakfast and lunch shows what a great value spot it is. Such a great base for Mui Ne we extended our stay by a week.
review.comment_negative: Not on the beach but there is a great beach bar very close.

review.comment_positive:
very central in Ham Tien, and also very quiet
rooms simple but totally fine, spacious bathroom
the pool area is great, enough lounge chairs to relax in the sun or shade
We liked it that breakfast was not included but could be ordered for an inexpensive price almost the whole day
very helpful and friendly staff
bicycles available for free and at short notice
Ham Tien has no beach at all, but an okay promenade with several "beach" bars where one can sit and look at the sea and enjoy the sunset
review.comment_negative: Just be aware up front that there is no beach in this part of Mui Ne. Then you can enjoy the hotel, the pool and the village, which are all good

review.comment_positive: The room was airy, spacious with a big, comfortable bed. Lovely view from the top floor (third) over the pool and densely-wooded surrounding area. The pool was great and very clean, Plenty of places to sit and wonderful artefacts, old French shutters and art work. May has put a lot of thought into the place. The place is now busy, which is great to see,  after two years closed due to Covid.  Oh, and the best range of world food at the adjoining food court and bar, where we ate regularly over our 5 day stay.  The Indian food in particular was excellent.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công
Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
- Grande réactivité dans la communication (via booking et wats app) 
- Nous avions réservé une nuit et nous sommes arrivés à 3h du matin. Notre hôte nous attendait à la réception pour assurer le checking très tôt. 
- Petit restaurant pour le petit déjeuner et le lunch. les produits sont frais et cuisinés maison. Nous nous sommes régalés ! 
- Possibilités de booker des Tour pour les activités de la ville (dunes, village de pêcheurs).
- La situation géographique permet d’aller à pied au Fairy stream et avec un peu plus de courage jusqu’au village de pêcheurs et au red dunes à pied. +- 4 km à pieds. 
- May, la propriétaire est très sympathique. 
- Balcon ou terrasse pour chaque chambre. 
- Le logement est juste à côté du food court et sans aucune nuisance sonore
review.comment_negative:
- Il fait très chaud dans la salle de bain. L’aération nous a semblé insuffisante.
- La possibilité de boire un cocktail ou une bière autour de la piscine en soirée serait une grande plus value. 
- Dommage, la petite restauration ferme à 16h.

review.comment_positive: Personel vraiment acceuillant, très propre, belle piscine, bon petit déjeuner à très bon prix, l'endroit est agréable et calme. Juste à coté, il y a un food court avec 14 différents restaurants, J'y retournerai, je recommande.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
May Bungalow is a wonderful place to relax and feel good. 
May and her family lovingly take care of the small bungalow complex and their guests. The facility consists of several bungalows and a two-story building around a pool.  The rooms are super clean have a fridge and kettle etc.... The first coffee in the morning is therefore secured.  We had booked with breakfast and were spoiled every morning with wonderful fruit salad, omelet, or even who likes a soup.  Fresh juice could also be ordered.  The price for extras is fair. The pool is clean and you can relax.  Right around the corner is a food court with delicious food and cold beer. To get to the beach you have to walk a few meters.  May organizes a tour to the dunes for you if you like. We will definitely come back.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: very clean bungalows, with help on site daily for fresh linens and towels. May herself is so sweet and helpful, the smoothie bowls were amazing and she’s happy to recommend other places to eat as well. while the vibe had lots of young travellers it was very quiet and serene. I can’t recommend this place enough, excellent value for your money. :)

review.comment_positive: J’ai adoré cette établissement! Les gérants, la chambre, l’emplacement génial!! J’ai même ajouté 1 nuit. L’hôtel est propre, se situe à 200 mètre de la plage, avec de bon restaurant autour. Je recommande vivement!! Un de mes meilleures séjour au Vietnam!

review.rating: One of our favourite places we have stayed!
review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công
review.comment_positive: We loved everything about May Bungalow. The owner May is the nicest person ever and helped us to organise a great tour to the sand dunes, and even helped with our onward buses which we had booked online. The hotel is so beautifully decorated, and is kept very clean and neat. Our room had everything we could want, and a lovely balcony overlooking the pool. Breakfast was also great with a good variety of different food to choose from, and fresh smoothies and juices. One of our favourite places we have stayed in Vietnam!
review.comment_negative: Nothing! For what you pay it's amazing value.

review.rating: Nice stay, cozy hotel/guesthouse, friendly staff!

review.comment_positive: Lovely clean pool. A clean bright room with a nice balcony that had a side sea view and a front view of some red dunes overlooking the pool. Beds were comfy. Staff were super friendly and helpful. There's a small restaurant on site with cheap prices and really good food. Also a food court right next door with everything you could want. Walking distance to everything.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Fabulous friendly place in Mui Ne
This place is well located and the May speaks excellent English and can assist with bus bookings and tours. It’s small, clean, well maintained and the pool is an absolute joy. 

We found plenty to do locally and many simple local eateries where authentic Vietnamese food was prepared when you ordered and western food too. We are vegetarian and that was no issue.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Die Anlage ist ein familiengeführtes Hotel in welchem wir sehr herzlich empfangen wurden. May ist eine liebevolle und fürsorgliche Gastgeberin. Jeden Tag hat sie uns mit ihrem selbstgemachten Frühstück verwöhnt. Die Zimmer waren sauber und groß.
In unmittelbarer Nähe befindet sich ein Food Court in dem man abends hervorragend essen kann, ob vietnamesisch, indisch, thailändisch für jeden Gaumen etwas dabei. Danke an May für eine tolle Zeit.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
방갈로 직원분들이.너무 좋았어요!
마지막날 호치민으로 오는 슬리핑버스 예약도 
선라이즈투어도 다 숙소에서 예약이 가능해요 
혼자 쓰기엔 넓은 침대와 너무 좋았던 테라스 
그리고 수영장까지도 매력덩어리예요!!
영어를 잘못해서 파파고덕을 많이 봤고 
마사지 받으러 가거나 할때마다 다 택시 불러주시고 
슬리핑버스 놓칠뻔했는데 버스 회사로 전화해서 다시.리턴하게 해주시고 ㅎㅎ 직원분들이 하나같이 너무 좋으시고 반겨 주셔서 행복했어요! 
다른 후기처럼 식사도 맛있었고 주변에 로컬 맛집도 많아서 보케거리까지 안나가도 충분히 즐길수 있어요 
길거리에서 파는 망고와 이것저것 과일도 너무 저렴하고
길거리에 앉아서 먹었던 커피도 잊을수가 없어요!! 
무이네 가시면 꼭 묵어보세요 
너무 좋았던 직원분들과 영어못해도 충분히 소통할수있어요
무이네에서 3일동안 행복하게 해준 방갈로 식구들 감사했어요!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: schöne Anlage, super Smoothie Bowls, freundliches und hilfsbereites Personal, Strand und Foodcourts in unmittelbarer Nähe

review.rating: Sehr zu empfehlen. Pool- lecker Frühstücken- sehr sauber und ruhig
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Der Pool ist erfrischend und sehr gut gepflegt. Zentral in einer kleinen Straße gelegen trotzdem ruhig. Ich hatte ein schönes Zimmer mit Balkon und Aussicht- der Sonnenaufgang war wunderschön. Das Personal ist super freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wegen der leckeren Frühstück Bowl kommen sogar Gäste von auswärts.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Big spacious room, nice balcony overlooking the pool, aircon + fan worked great, pool itself was big and refreshing. Cafe attached to reception served lovely breakfast. Right near the beachfront. Lots of seating around the pool too! 
Literally next door to the food court which is the best place to eat in Mui Ne too.

review.rating: Best place to stay in Mui Ne!
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
What a gem in Mui Ne!

Exceptional value for money
Beautiful clean pool
Friendly owner who helped us so much
Great location (right beside a good court)
Cheap motorbike rental (arrived in 5 minutes!) 
Laundry service
Clean, comfortable bed (mattress and pillows were just perfect)
Great smoothie bowls (try the tropical!)
Super fast and stable wifi
Hot water and powerful shower
Spotlessly clean
Friendly staff
Beautiful, quiet location

Would definitely return 😊

review.room_type: Bungalow
review.comment_positive: 방은 깨끗했고 직원은 친절했어요

review.rating: Best accommodation we stayed at in Vietnam. Thank you again Chi Tam and team!
review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
Location was perfect. Though not in the tourist centre, there were lots of food options including the Dong Vui food court that had both Vietnamese and international food options. Great coffee right in front. It was also very easy to find for taxis and tours so we had no problems at all in that regard. 
The rooms itself were immaculate. Clean and spacious and housekeeping was provided for everyday. The pool and overall atmosphere was relaxing and what we were looking for to escape from the hustle and bustle/ vietnams crazy city life.
We couldn’t believe the value for the price we were paying. 
Staff were also lovely and accommodating and allowed us to use the bikes whenever we needed to get around. Smoothie bowls were also the best I’ve had!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Fabulous smoothie bowls served for breakfast and lunch.  Nice Pool.  Great Food Court next door
review.comment_negative: Rooms had too much light coming in during the night.  Need better curtains with black out lining

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Vị trí cũng bình thường, không quá tiện cho gia đình. Phòng ốc ở mức cơ bản, cũng được.

review.room_type: Bungalow với Sân hiên
review.comment_positive:
친절한 스태프와 맛있는 밥
그리고 별채를 사용할 수 있어서 좋았고 앞에 풀장도 있음
review.comment_negative: 바퀴벌레와의 한판승부 인줄 알았으나 검지 2마디 만한 바퀴뻘레가 2마리나 나와서 심장마비 걸릴뻔함 조심하세요

review.room_type: Bungalow với Sân hiên
review.comment_positive: yên tĩnh

review.room_type: Bungalow với Sân hiên
Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công
Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The breakfast smoothie bowls were amazing. Nice pool and rooms. When our bikes broke down on the road the staff came and helped us out.
review.comment_negative: Its a little bit far from the nicer beaches in mui ne

review.room_type: Bungalow
review.comment_positive: Eigenaar en personeel erg vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Gratis fietsen kunnen lenen en de kamer was mooi groot en schoon.
review.comment_negative: De accommodatie was niks op aan te merken, alleen de ligging. Het strand 100 meter verderop kun je geen strand noemen. Tijdens eb is er een kort strookje vies strand met veel afval.

review.rating: Environmentally friendly, delicious food and amazing stay
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: Wow, May Bungalows exceeded my expectations. Felt like I was staying in a 5 star resort - lovely food (breakfast, drinks and lunch), lovely pool and sun loungers and nice room. The staff are so friendly and smiley. The smoothie bowls and pancakes are delish here. So cool with what they are doing in trying to reduce use of plastic. Free water refills for guests and they try to deter you from buying plastic water bottles, if only every place was like this in Vietnam!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Sehr schöne, saubere Unterkunft mit sehr freundlichem und hilfsbereiten Personal  in super Lage.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Alles ist perfekt. Diese Unterkunft war einer der besten in Vietnam. Die Besitzerin ist so hilfsbereit und kompetent. Das Frühstück ist mega lecker.
review.comment_negative: Es gibt absolut nichts negatives zu berichten.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: Chỗ nghĩ tuyệt vời, chị chủ vui vẻ, thân thiện

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công
Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Mooie rustig gelegen kamers en bungalows rond een heerlijk zwembad.  Direct in de buurt allerlei restaurantjes en winkeltjes. Strand op loopafstand. Staf was heel vriendelijk en makkelijk in de omgang. Ontbijt heerlijk, alles vers.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi
Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The owner is super charming always smiling, very helpful. The rest of the staff are also lovely. The place is very neat with a great pool and inner yard to enjoy. The place is very calm so party crews should maybe stay away. They offer a good meny of breakfast and lunch dishes at a pretty cheap rate. The rooms are excellent, clean with a nice balcony towards the inner yard. Mays is situated just beside the main road where lots of restaurants and beer places can be found. Don't miss out on a Bia Hoi!
review.comment_negative: There is nothing negative to say about the place itself. It's great. But the nearby beaches were a disappointment - very dirty and much trash. A bit of a shame.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Smallish place, good rooms , nice pool

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Không gian vừa đủ cho nhóm. Ban công nhỏ, tiện nghi ở mức cơ bản.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Absolutely everything is exceptional! The room is cozy, airy, the balcony is great, the views are splendid. The staff is a 10, so super kind and helpful!  Their breakfast is great and those fruit smoothie bowls are an absolute delight! The area around the pool has shade and also sun, sun louges, swings, everything needed. The bungalows are close to a nice beach bar and to the international food court (which we were actually not huge fans of, we preferred the ladies selling some sort of seafood omelet near by) . The rooms are cleaned every day and the towels changed. We ended up extending our stay because it was such a relaxing oasis after 4 weeks of travelling all over Vietnam.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Alles! Fantastische kamer en prachtig zwembad. Ik werd ziek en de eigenaren waren zo zorgzaam. Heerlijk ontbijt.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.rating: friendly staff , great location , very clean
review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: When you first arrive, it is like entering a tropical paradise. lots of plants that keep it cool during the day and decorations are aesthetically pleasing! the pool is very clean and the rooms are very new, clean, and comfortable! the staff is also very friendly! also location is perfect!!! I cannot recommend this hotel more!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Alles an unserem Aufenthalt in MAY Bungalow war einfach super 🙂. Es hat uns hier sogar so gut gefallen, dass wir um 4! Nächte verlängert haben. 

- die Zimmer sind schön, hell, ordentlich und werden jeden Tag gereinigt inkl. neuer Handtücher. 
- super liebe und hilfsbereite Mitarbeiter/innen. Sie waren immer nett und haben für uns eine Wüstentour sowie die Weiterfahrt organisiert
- Man kann ohne Aufpreis oder Gebühr mit der Karte zahlen (Maestro und Visa gingen beide)
- die Klimaanlage und der Ventilator haben gut funktioniert
- es ist sehr ruhig dort und perfekt zum entspannen
- der Poolbereich ist sauber, einladend und die Poolliegen bequem 
- das Essen und die Getränke dort sind super. Sowohl die Bowls, die Pancakes/Crepes oder die Banh Mi.
- man kann kostenlos Wasserflaschen auffüllen. Top! 
- der Strand ist nicht weit und es gibt schöne Strandbars
- man kann dort Bücher ausleihen. Es gibt viele unterschiedliche Sprachen

Sonstiges:
- der Foodcourt nebenan ist super
- der Massagesalon gegenüber ist auch sehr gut

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Giường ngủ cũng được, phòng cách âm tạm. Nhìn chung là ở mức chấp nhận được.

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Our two-week stay at May's in January was simply fantastic! The value for money was unbeatable, with clean rooms, comfy beds, and modern bathrooms. The staff, fluent in English, were incredibly friendly and helpful. May herself went out of her way to assist us, even arranging a tour to Da Lat for my parents in their native language. The hotel's location was ideal, surrounded by great restaurants, scenic sunset spots, and a beautiful beach. Highly recommended for a memorable stay. Huge thanks to May and the team for their hospitality!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: the most helpful and wonderful woman runs the hotel. I can’t even describe how naturally personable she is. she looks out for your interests and in an area often full of people looking to exploit tourists, she offers the exact opposite. Went above and beyond for us. One of the nicest people I’ve met in the world.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
아담하고 내부 외부 모두 청결했습니다. 수영장도 잘 관리되어보여서 수영도 했습니다. 
매일 하루 식사를 이곳에서 했습니다. 만원 안되는 가격에 메뉴2개, 음료2개 배부르게 먹었었습니다. 
또 머물고 싶어요. 한국인에게 유명한 곳인줄 알았는데, 외국인만 만났어요 :-) 암튼 만족만족!
review.comment_negative: 샤워 필터를 꼭 챙겨가세요. 호치민-붕따우-무이네-나트랑 순서중에 (아직 나트랑은 안가봐ㅆ는데) 제일 검게 나왔어용.

review.room_type: Bungalow

review.rating: Personalet var Fantastiske! Hadde definitivt valgt dette overnattingsstedet på nytt.
review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Alt var over all forventning, beste smoothie bowls i Vietnam!
review.comment_negative: Aircondition fungerte litt dårlig som førte til at vi måtte sette den på 16 grader for at det skulle være komfortabelt.

review.rating: Perfekt Aufenthalt in einer großartigen Unterkunft
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Sehr schöne Unterkunft, der Pool ist super, die ganze Anlage ist sehr schön und mit viel Liebe im Detail gestaltet, May ist absolut freundlich und sooo hilfsbereit! Zum Strand sind es ca. 150m, man kann dort auch baden allerdings ist der Strand nicht so schön. Ca. 5km entfernt ist ein sehr schöner Badestrand. Wir können die Unterkunft wärmstens weiterempfehlen und würden sofort wieder kommen.

review.room_type: Phòng 3 Người Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: May the owner was so welcoming. She helped with everything and made us feel so much at home while we were staying. I was sick from food poisoning and she bought me bread and made fruit bowls  for me free of charge - just because she wanted me to feel better. The place was clean and quiet and the pool was lovely. Would stay anytime again and have absolutely nothing bad to say about the place. Thank you for being so considerate a host May.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The swimming pool. Excellent breakfast. Owner speak english and always ready to help

review.room_type: Bungalow
review.comment_positive: The venue was exactly what we needed. We had originally booked into a hostel down the road but I was not feeling well so needed a private room and May Bungalow was perfect for some space to chill out. The room was clean and spacious and the pool was perfect. The staff were extremely helpful and really accommodating. Would definitely stay here again.

review.room_type: Bungalow
review.comment_positive:
제일 좋았던 건 친절한 사장님과 직원들이었습니다.
게다가 음식! 딴 곳에 갈 필요없이 메이 식당이 맛집이에요.
청소도 한 밤중에 부탁해도 다 해주시고 베개커버, 침대보, 이불까지 매일 새걸로 갈아줘요. 믿고 잘 잤어요.
review.comment_negative: 화장실이 아무래도 깨끗하게 청소해 줘도 옛식이라 냄새가 쪼오금 납니다. 수압도 조금 낮아요 하지만 뜨거운 물 콸콸이라 다 괜찮습니다,

review.rating: 学生でも気軽に贅沢を味わえる宿
review.room_type: Bungalow với Sân hiên
review.comment_positive:
清潔に保たれており設備も贅沢なのに価格がとても安い！
スタッフが愛想が良く困った時には助けてくれた！

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive:
Die Unterkunft ist einfach toll um ein paar Tage zu entspannen. Super Pool, tolle Zimmer, zentral gelegen und trotzdem ruhig.
May und ihr Bruder sind unglaublich hilfsbereit und nett.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Such clean rooms. Staff so friendly and warm. Lovely clean swimming pool with plenty sun beds. Location situated right next to the food court which has loads of fab restaurants. They sorted the sand dunes tour for us and our taxi to our next bus stop. Gave us all cute homemade bracelets at the end of our stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Bungalow với Sân hiên
Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Friendliness of the staff, eye for detail and decoration, well maintaned garden. Breakfast is served a la carte until 15h30.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi
Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: convenient location and friendly staff.
review.comment_negative: bathroom needs to be cleaned better and the blanket should be bigger for queen size mattresses.

review.rating: 地理位置佳：前面是大街、後面是海灘，玩水活動業者就在附近。吃飯、喝酒都不成問題，附近的餐館都不錯！
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: 旅館乾淨、服務人員熱情。早餐雖然要額外訂購，但是有品質。很認真在經營的旅館。

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: We loved everything about May Bungalow! Our room was nice, spacious, clean, with a small balcony and good natural light. The pool is great and clean. The smoothie bowls at breakfast are just delicious! The owner is very kind and helpful. you can rent a motorcycle from there, and they can also book your bus trips, tours etc. We really thought it was excellent value for money.

review.room_type: Bungalow
Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Literally wish we could move in there! Everything was spotless. The rooms, garden, pool and the nicest people working there ever who helped us with anything from hiring scooters, bus tickets to recommendations. There’s a beautiful beach about 300m away situated at The Pineapple bar and the hotel is just next door from the Foodcourt. Don’t remember the last time we were that happy about our stay. Thank you so much xxx

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: They have nice, good-sized rooms with balconies looking over the pool.  The pool is kept clean and big for this kind of hotel.  It's next to a good food court with lots of selection.  The breakfast, especially the banh mi's, is good.  The staff is helpful and friendly.

review.rating: Choose this place in Mui Ne
review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: We loved staying at May Bungalow. The pools lovely, the breakfast restaurant is great and the family owning the place are the best - very kind, fun and helpful. We would recommend everyone going here and will definitely come back! The location is also nice - area is nice and Mui Ne city center is more worth trip than staying there.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Một nơi ở tạm ổn cho chuyến đi ngắn. Phòng có ban công, sạch sẽ ở mức cơ bản.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
The owner is lovely and incredibly helpful with organising everything you might need during your stay.
Rooms are spotless and the pool is great to chill around.
Next door to a ‘food court’ which has really cheap food and a huge variety. As well as cheap Draught beer and good price France/South American Wine.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The room felt cosy, the toilet was spacious, and the view of the town from the balcony was great!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Great location right next to the food court with lots of options available. Nice pool and only a 5-10 drive from really nice beaches. The staff were great, very friendly and helpful offering assistance with tour/bus ticket bookings. Great value for money. Would definitely recommend this hotel!

review.rating: В Муйне хорошее соотношение цена/качество. Особенно этот отдых подходит для любителей серфинга: винд, вейв, кайт. Мы
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Мы приехали во время нового года по лунному календарю, когда большинство заведений закрыто, а цены завышены. Вопреки обстоятельствам хозяйка Мэй помогла нам решить все вопросы: с обменом валюты, с трансфером, с арендой велосипедов. 
Из окон нашего номера открывался прекрасный вид на бассейн и пальмы. В номере убирались каждый день. Персонал был очень вежливым и отзывчивым.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Địa điểm yên tĩnh , xung quanh có khu vực quán ăn khá tiện lợi

review.room_type: Phòng 3 Người Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: A lovely Guesthouse. May runs a very good business here. The bedrooms are spotlessly clean, spacious and comfortable. Delicious meals are served in her restaurant. The pool is very welcoming and the surrounds very attractive. We would recommend May’s Bungalow!

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Heerlijke verblijf met ruime en vooral schone kamers. Personeel is erg vriendelijk en het eten is goed.
review.comment_negative: Kan wat afgelegen liggen maar als je gebruik maakt van een motor of grab geen enkel probleem

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: the price not expensive
review.comment_negative: the staff take photo of my passport and visa without asking me,even no copy machine

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
La piscine , les super bawl fruits glaces graines. La gentillesse du personnel.
Nous y avons séjourné 5 nuits . Vraiment super.

review.room_type: Bungalow
review.comment_positive: Lovely family run business where May is exceptionally helpful. The property is consistently cleaned. Well situated to the Food Market next door, Pineapple Bar and Fruit markets.
review.comment_negative: No fault of the owners but the nearest ATM is about 1.5kms away. Note May Bungalow's accepts card.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Lady is super friendly and very helpfull. Also very funny and smiling. Very nice room with big bathroom. Great pool as well.

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công

review.rating: schönes Bungalow Hotel zum Seele baumeln lassen und genießen
review.room_type: Bungalow với Sân hiên
review.comment_positive: Wir hatten zu dritt einen sehr geräumigen Bungalow mit zwei Zimmern (insgesamt 3 Doppelbetten und einem Rundbett) und einer kleinen Veranda direkt davor. Die Anlage ist sehr schön sauber, ruhig und gemütlich. Die Inhaberin ist sehr freundlich und spricht gut Englisch. die Anlage liegt direkt neben einem Foodcourt, in dem man von morgens bis abends Köstlichkeiten bekommt.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: It is a very neat and clean place. And more important: it is quiet. The owners are very friendly. It is a good place in Mui Ne. You can rent a bike or motorbike,  they organise a transfer to another City for you. They are really helpful. There is access to the beach (some meters)  and nearby a really good beach Bar. There is also a great food court. But May Bungalow also serves some food and drinks. You have to try the smoothie bowls.I loved it there.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi
Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
Schöne Anlage mit nettem Personal. Zimmer war groß und gut ausgestattet. Lage war gut, großer Foodcourt daneben und in 5 Gehminuten zum schönen langen Strand. (Verstehe die Kommentare nicht die den Strand nicht finden konnten, der ist direkt daneben mit einer schönen langen Sandpromenade).
Frühstück war sehr gut mit großer a la carte Auswahl. Wasser gabs auch gratis zum Nachfüllen.
review.comment_negative: Immer wieder Ameisen im Zimmer, aber das lässt sich  wohl kaum vermeiden und störte uns auch nicht weiter.

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
두 번째 방문. 숙소 깨끗하고 직원분들 친절하시고 수영장도 좋습니다.
주변에 현대식 마트가 있습니다. (큰길 나가서 왼쪽으로 100미터)
review.comment_negative: 숙소 자체가 크지 않고 주변이 다소 혼잡합니다. 바닷가쪽으로 내려가면 시원합니다.

review.room_type: Bungalow với Sân hiên
review.comment_positive: Wir haben einen Bungalow gebucht und haben uns hier so wohl gefühlt, dass wir spontan 1 Nacht länger geblieben sind. Der Bungalow ist sehr geräumig, hat große und angenehme Betten und ist sauber. Jeder Bungalow hat eine eigene Terrasse und liegen direkt um den Pool im Innenhof. Dieser ist ebenfalls sehr sauber und erfrischend. Die Besitzerin (und ihr Team) ist sehr freundlich, hilft einem beim Organisieren von Touren, Transfers etc. und macht super leckeres Frühstück und fantastische Smoothiebowls. Während unserer Tour durch Vietnam war unser Aufenthalt hier ein gemütlicher, sehr schöner und entspannter Zwischenstopp, bei dem wir unsere Energie für die Weiterreise auftanken konnten :)

review.rating: Extended weekend in a family friendly place not far from the sea.

review.comment_positive: Everything! Amazing hotel and right next to lovely food court.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Our best stay in SE Asia so far! Everything was perfect - the food was amazing (especially the smoothie bowls), location perfect, everywhere perfectly clean, pool was lovely, staff were so helpful. It is a really beautiful place to stay as well. Absolutely recommend.

review.rating: Loved our stay at May Bungalow!
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: I’m never one to leave reviews (which I should do more often) but I had to leave a review for our stay at MAY Bungalow, we loved our time here. The staff are SO friendly, upon arrival we were given the option of two rooms to choose from (one had a sea view and one didn’t) they let us have the room with a sea view at no extra cost! The room was lovely and spacious, the pool and surrounding facilities were lovely and clean. We never struggled to get a sunbed. There’s also a lovely beach bar just a short walk from the hotel which is nice to watch sunset with a cocktail. We ate at the street food area next door to the hotel every evening, the food there was amazing, definitely a little gem! Would highly recommend MAY bungalow!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi

review.comment_positive: Phòng ốc khá đơn giản, sạch sẽ ở mức cơ bản. Ban công nhỏ, bình thường.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive:
We enjoyed swimming in the pool. The room was very clean and the staff friendly. 

The food court near the hotel was fantastic. And the massage in front of the hotel was good. 

 All in all we enjoyed our three nights  in mui ne. it was a relaxing time.
review.comment_negative:
The beach was as usually in Vietnam not clean. 
Fortunately the pool from the hotel was clean so we decided to hang around the pool instead of the beach.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi

review.comment_positive:

The restaurant on site is very cheap and has excellent smoothie bowls. Reception helped us book Mũi Né yours and buses.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Fantastic stay at May Bungalow. Host was very lovely and helpful. Room was clean and spacious, I loved the balcony. Location was right near local food places, a gorgeous food court and the beach which was helpful [less than 5 minutes walk]. Swimming pool was so lovely as it was boiling. Breakfast was also good. Highly recommend this stay for anyone in Mui Ne. We loved it!

review.comment_positive: Fabulous little home stay. Clean room, clean bathroom comfortable bed very calm, peaceful and quiet despite being just off the main road. Outside pool area provides plenty of sun loungers and pool is well maintained and again clean. May and the staff are incredibly friendly, always laughing and smiling. Breakfast is best in Mui Ne and very reasonably priced. Right next to the food court which is the place to be in the evenings.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The staff were so welcoming and lovely. The stay felt so homely, clean and had all the facilities we needed. The best stay we’ve had travelling in 6 weeks, highly recommend staying here!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Phòng ốc sạch sẽ. Mọi thứ rất ổn. Không phải decor kiểu cách nhưng rất phổ thông và gọn gàng sạch sẽ. Mỗi ngày đều có nhân viên đến lau dọn phòng. Vợ chồng mình rất ưng. 
Chị chủ rất nhiệt tình, dễ thương. Nhất định lần tới mình sẽ tiếp tục lưu trú ở đây

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Vše super, od personálu, snídaní, bazénu, pokojů i čistoty.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
The May Bungalow was absolutely amazing!!! We loved our 3 night stay here and wish we had longer. The pool was refreshing and extremely clean, the staff were all lovely and extremely helpful (especially May and her husband), and our room was light, spacious and very clean with beautiful views of the sea. Highly recommended this accomodation. 
The smoothie bowls are so delicious. Fresh fruit, a perfect size, and great value for money. The smoothies and Banh Mi are also delicious. We ate here every day for breakfast and lunch and then just next door is an international food court with great food - our personal favourite the burger bar and the Indian. 
The beach is just down the road with a lovely side walk and some cool beach bars. 
The laundry service was great and cheap. We booked our bus here to HCM which was reasonably priced and very comfortable! If you get a chance book this place immediately, do not think twice!!
review.comment_negative: We loved everything!! Have been travelling for 6 months and this stands out as one of our favourite accommodations.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Super Hôtel situé à Mui Né. Les propriétaires sont adorables et toujours d’une grande aide. La piscine est parfaite pour se relaxer (a défaut des plages, très sales dans la région). Les petits déjeuners sont également très bons et pas cher !

review.room_type: Phòng cho 3 người có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Alles bestens hier, gerne wieder, danke May!
review.comment_negative: wir waren erst in den normalen Zimmern, sind dann aber in ein Garten Bungalow gezogen, deutlich schöner und definitiv das Geld wert!

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
메이가 진짜 친절하고 도움도 많이 줌.
숙소의 투어가 다른곳보다 저렴함.
세심하고 청결함!!
우리는 2박하고 다른 숙소로 옮겨 1박 했는데 메이가 버스 예약도 도와줌. (전화번호가 없는 우리를 대신해 연락처도 남겨주고, 숙소 이전 이후에도 버스회사의 연락을 우리에게 톡으로 대신 전달해줌)
방크기도 1박 10만원넘는 리조트랑 비교해도 크기에 부족함이 없고 뷰도 풀뷰로 예쁜편.
방에도 개미 한 마리 보이지 않음.
3층의 경우 복도에서 바다가 보임.
review.comment_negative:
샤워 수압이 쫌 약하고 보케에서 쪼금 멀다..?
거의 없었어서....

대부분 만족!

review.comment_positive: excellent location and staff is very friendly and helpful:)

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Sehr freundliches Personal, saubere und ordentliche Zimmer mit bequemen Betten. Top Frühstücksangebot mit herrlichen Fruitbowls. Man kann Touren und Weiterreisen ganz unkompliziert im Hotel buchen. Der Pool ist schön groß und sauber. Hier kann man auch herrlich Zeit verbringen. Zum Strand sind es ein Fußminuten. Der Strand ist allerdings nicht besonders schön. Zum Essen gehen hat man hier extrem viel und gute Auswahl. Die Lage ist zentral und trotzdem sehr gut. Tolle Massage gleich gegenüber. Wir würden unbedingt wiederkommen.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Bestes Frühstück unserer Vietnamtour. 
Tolles Personal, alle mega freundlich und zuvorkommend.
Laundry, Rollerverleih wurde alles organisiert. 
Gute Lage zu Foodcourt und Strandbars in der Nachbarschaft.
Nach kurzer Eingewöhnung (und Tipps der Chefin) ein doch sehr schöner Platz um zu verweilen.
review.comment_negative:
alles ein bisschen in die Jahre gekommen.
Wer einen Badestrand erwartet ist hier falsch - fußläufig nicht zu erreichen.

review.rating: Cute Property with Lovely Comfy Rooms

review.comment_positive: Really nice owner, very helpful! Room was lovely and the pool area and grounds was really thoughtfully decorated. Very close to the food court which is a handy option for meals ☺️
review.comment_negative: Location was good but not ideal for me personally, a lot of the restaurants we loved were further down the main road in the area of Phan Thiet which is very quickly reached by scooter but is a bit of a walk! It didn’t bother us much because we had a scooter but just something to note! We did also eat in the food court and there’s a lot of food options there too.

review.rating: Worth the money, an excellent stay 🧘🏼‍♀️🩶
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Excellent location
Food court next door - amazing! So many options
Quiet area 
Security good
Cafe at hotel is good, went there for breakfast and lunch each day. Good food too, friendly staff, approachable 🙏🏼
review.comment_negative:
Where my room was (not in a bungalow) the sun rose and shone into the rooms. This was at 5am for me. My room got so bright at 5am I woke up each day which upset my sleep cycle. I had a sleep mask but it comes off as I sleep.
I think the rooms facing the sun rise should have blackout blinds to help. This would help guests fall asleep. 

If you want the tour - maybe book somewhere else - the driver was so dangerous!!!!! Such a high speed on roads to dunes. I paid him to slow down! He had no consideration for his passengers. Must’ve been going 80-90mph in a jeep with no seat belts and dangerous driving!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Wir hatten eine sehr tolle Zeit in Mays Unterkunft. Es war alles perfekt, liebevoll gestaltet, sehr sauber und komfortabel. Wir hatten den besten Schlaf unserer Reise! Besonders erwähnenswert ist das unglaublich leckere und vielseitige Frühstücksangebot und natürlich May, die sich immer um uns gekümmert und bei allem geholfen hat. Danke

review.comment_positive: MAY Bungalow war perfekt zum Entspannen. Die ganze Anlage ist sehr liebevoll gestaltet und der Pool eignet sicher sehr gut zum Schwimmen und abkühlen. Das Personal ist sehr nett und hat sich super um uns gekümmert. Wenn man möchte, kann man auch im MAY Bungalow frühstücken oder unter Tags Snacks konsumieren. Man hat aber im Umkreis auch noch viele Restaurants, Cafés und Ban Mi Stände. Wir konnten dort auch einen  Ausflug mit dem Jeep und unseren weiteren Transfer mit dem Bus buchen. Es hat alles super funktioniert und wir würden dort sicher wieder ein Zimmer buchen.

review.comment_positive: This was just perfect. Best location (at the nicest part of the beach, best vegan restaurants nearby, right next to a Futa Bus stop...), nice clean quiet room with an AC that worked really well, nice swimming pool with crystal clear water, an excellent cafe with vegan options (May Bowls Mui Ne), great team of super-nice, good-humoured and professional staff who were always friendly and very helpful (for example, when we had a question about the bus connection, the staff immediately called the bus company so they could answer our question). Best place we could hope for. Thanks for everything!

I received bottled water multiple times and even a discount on my room.

Good location for the red sand dunes, fairy stream and mui ne beach!

review.rating: Beautiful place, great pool and a short walk to the beach

До моря 2 минуты в другую сторону, но оно в Муйне не пляжное :) до ресторанов с морепродуктами 3 км, идти немного долго, но за 2 доллара в любое время приедет такси

May, her brother and team, who was always on hand to help with questions and recommendations for food to eat nearby. She help arranged a transport for me to Binh Thuan train station for a reasonable rate. You have got to the try her banh mi
(recommended), which is available for breakfast.  

Although there were some hiccups during my stay, she and her brother ensured it got resolved ASAP.   

The mattress was firm and comfortable, very clean and spacious room with a pool view. 
May is a nice and friendly person to chat with.  I would love to book again, for my return trip to Mui Ne.  

Location: 
The breakwater to see the sea –10 mins walk 
 Nearby food places -5-10 mins walk

review.comment_positive: Location could not be better! The property backs onto a lively foodcourt serving any cuisine you could ask for (vietnamese, indian, chinese, mexican, italian etc.) and pineapple beach club is a 5 minute walk along the beach. The people working here are friendly and helped us with everything we needed, including cheap (cheaper than 12Go) bus tickets to Saigon. Also try their smoothie bowls 🫶🏻
review.comment_negative: You lose the sun quickly because it gets blocked by the apartments

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Bungalow với Sân hiên
review.comment_positive:
De accommodatie heeft diverse plekjes waar je heerlijk kunt relaxen. Het zwembad is groot genoeg om wat baantjes te trekken en af te koelen. De bedden zijn prima en er is een uitstekende douche met warm water. Dagelijks wordt de bungalow/kamer schoongemaakt en de koffie weer aangevuld. Het ontbijt is voortreffelijk met heel veel keus. Wij kunnen de schaal met een zelfgemaakte vruchtensmoothy met muesli en andere lekkernijen aanbevelen. Maar ook de omelet met kaas is heerlijk. Fietsen zijn gratis beschikbaar. En is er iets in of om je kamer, dan wordt er direct actie ondernomen om het op te lossen (bij ons werkte bij aankomst het WiFi matig, maar na melding werd dit opgelost en werkte het perfect). De eigenaren en de andere medewerkers zijn behulpzaam, vriendelijk en klantgericht. Het vervolgvervoer hebben zij geregeld.
De locatie is prima, naast een grote foodcourt met allerlei kraampjes waar je diverse soorten eten kunt krijgen, van Vietnamees tot Indisch, maar ook een hamburger. Geluidsoverlast heb je er niet van. Vlakbij bevindt zich de Pineapple bar waar je heerlijk kunt zitten en genieten van de zee en zonsondergang.

L'établissement propose une excursion levée du soleil, les dunes, village de pêcheur qui vaut le coup. Savoir que la jeep nous pose à 500m de la dune où une personne nous propose un quad à un prix exhorbitant.... Le trajet à pied dans le sable est largement faisable !!

review.comment_positive:
May's Bungalow is definitiv the best place to stay in Mui Ne. Even though located next to an international food court and close to local restaurants as well as the beach, it's super quiet. May herself doesn't allow noise (like party crowds) and also neglects room requests when there is K TV involved.
Furthermore, the room is super clean and comfy. It's simple but you get everything you need. The pool area is protected by the shadow and perfect for having a coffee and waking up (also with hammocks).
Lastly, May gonna help you with everything you need and seems always interested in her guests and up to chat with you :)

review.rating: Great for chill, not good for beaches
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Atmosphere is really good with a lot of foreigns chilling around.

The room has a great size and I think all have their own balcony.

Their fruit bowls are a really good option for breakfast or afternoon snack.

There are a food court just next to the place, among many other options walking distance.
review.comment_negative:
Internet conection isn't great if you are planning to work from there, especially if you need to make videocalls.

Unfortunately most of the staff can't speak a word in English, but all are very friendly anyway.

The beach "in front" of the place is not really a beach. People don't go there. Unfortunately I found out that it seems this is not the best destination (and sourroundings) to visit if you are looking for chill at the beach. They are more known for beach sports like windsurf and kitesurf.
